Infectra:....Hehe..Your funny!...man...i have a head ache.. *Infectra says =
happily* *Infectra starts to raise up some but stops and lays but down* Inf=
ectra: Hello?...any...one here?...what..was that......what was in that...mi=
xture to.... *Infectra starts to fall asleep but stops herself* Infectra: M=
ake...us sick?.... *Infectra goes to sleep and wakes back up*
  ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesd=
ay, July 18, 2000 4:44 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Airbomber rolle=
d over and put his arms around Infectra. He smiled and was suddenly snoring=
...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, July 17, 2000 1:47 AM
    Subject: Re: =
Neo Beast Wars


    *Infectra's optics open and see's a bunch of blurs til=
l she focuses but was still dizzy* Infectra:....woooooat happened?....oh ye=
ah...I thunk soooo.... *Infectra starts to stand up till she's fully standi=
ng* Infectra: I think that we should see what that we eaten!.... *Infectra =
says cheerfully before falling back to the ground and than her optics widen=
* Infectra: I have a....head ache.....and a stomich ache....
      ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
    Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 11:42 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
=


      Airbomber walked to Infectra and collapsed near her face down. Stra=
nato finally caught up to Arrow and grabbed him. Both of them passed out as=
 well. Blender and Stroghold looked at each other and then shrugged again. =
They collapsed as well. Train Wreck collapsed. Later, Airbomber wakes up. H=
e walks a step and kneels down, he throws up and stands back up again befor=
e falling oveer again, the world was spinning. Stranato came back holding a=
 sleeping Arrow by his arm.

      "Youuuu ookayyeeee?" Stranato asked.

  =
    "I thank sue." Airbomber replied. Stranato dropped Arrow and fell. He l=
aughed and groaned. Airbomber looked back to Infectra to see if she was alr=
ight...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards=
 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 6:47 =
PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        *Infectra jumps up running=
 behind a bush spitting the mixture out* Infectra:....oohhh..... *Infectra =
moans because she was now getting a stomich ache* *Infectra walks back out =
and falls on her back*
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          Fr=
om: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Sunday, July=
 16, 2000 5:37 PM
          Subject: Neo Beast Wars


          Plintissa w=
alked around the desert, night was falling (Is it okay for night to fall in=
 Plintissa's area?) and she didn't believe her luck. Her scanner was broken=
, Artist's scanner was broken or he was too stupid to use it, probably the =
latter, and she was hungry, there wasn't anything but sand out here. Now th=
at the sun was going down, it started to cool down and Plintissa was calmed=
. Plintissa walked on, thinking about how miserable life had been to her, a=
nd that it only intended to get worse, why did she come to this planet anyw=
ay? Why did she leave Cybertron? She remembered that she did indeed have ON=
E friend on Cybertron, a friend that loved her with all heart, only problem=
 was, Plintissa didn't love this friend back, because the friend was a femb=
ot. Plintissa's old friend was eventually killed by some bots in the shadow=
s, never did catch those creeps neither. She later learned that the murdere=
rs were a couple that had killed millions, but somehow always illuded the c=
ops. Stupid police, never good enough when you need them to be REALLY good,=
 maybe she was expecting too much. Plintissa seen something but assumed it =
was a mirage, she assumed right...

          Artist walked along the deser=
t, tapping his scanner, it was broken. Either Plintissa's scanner was broke=
n or she was too stupid to use it, probably the latter, he couldn't believe=
 his luck! Artist walked through the desert, thinking about how boring his =
life was, he walked through the desest, he served crippled bots, he hung ar=
ound, he did good things and never was even noticed, he was tired of it all=
! The Maximals needed a hero, he brung it to them, they never payed him any=
 mind! Artist held his head in rage, his headache swelling, he snarled a sn=
arl not normally done by wovles. He transformed to Beast mode and ran acros=
s the desert, howling and remembering. He impaled Plintissa on a broken off=
 autogun, he impaled Sinesis the same way, Plintissa blew him to pieces? He=
 screamed in arge and passed out...

          Dracona walked around the co=
rner, she wouldn't miss the chance to screw something up in the Pred base s=
ince nobody seemed to be there! Dracona slowly made for the entrance...

  =
        Gangon's spark started going dim and started to fade, seeing as how=
 it has been seperated from it's body for so long...

          Sinesis wok=
e up from Stasis lock and pulled away from Blizzard, in extreme pain, he pu=
lled past Quickstrike andf threw Sinister's parts into a CR Tank. Then fall=
ing in himself, going into stasis lock. (Orchid is unable to reply at the m=
oment, so I went ahead and took my characters to the CR Chamber, don't want=
 them dead.)

          The Radicons went on eating the stuff and Train Wre=
ck took the time to examine it.

          "This was made with poisonous ve=
rries and poisonous mushrooms." Train Wreck said. Stranato looked at Arrow =
with a "Going to kill" look and stood up. He waved for Arrow to come. Arrow=
 started to walk away. Stranato followed him. Arrow ran! Stranato chased hi=
m. Blender and Stronghold shrugged and drank beer.

          "That was sti=
ll good eating." Stronghold said.

          "I don't feel too well." Airbo=
mber said. Stronghold and Blender laughed. Train Wreck rolled his eyes and =
examined the other stuff in the weirf food made by Arrow. Squirrel meat? We=
ird...

          Deemos walked right up to the Maximal base, hoping the au=
toguns wouldn't fire, and headed toward the entrance...
